body_html: Definitely very low precision networks become more and more popular: see Trained Ternary Quantization and Incremental Network Quantization: Towards Lossless CNNs with Low-Precision Weights. We are looking forward for arbitrary quantization and efficient operations (e.g. XNOR-popcount) in TensorFlow
body_text: Definitely very low precision networks become more and more popular: see Trained Ternary Quantization and Incremental Network Quantization: Towards Lossless CNNs with Low-Precision Weights. We are looking forward for arbitrary quantization and efficient operations (e.g. XNOR-popcount) in TensorFlow
body: Definitely very low precision networks become more and more popular: see [Trained Ternary Quantization](https://arxiv.org/abs/1612.01064) and [Incremental Network Quantization: Towards Lossless CNNs with Low-Precision Weights](https://arxiv.org/abs/1702.03044). We are looking forward for arbitrary quantization and efficient operations (e.g. XNOR-popcount) in TensorFlow
